key.name: audio-device-selection
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to provide the audio device selection dialog.

key.name: automount-manager
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to automount removable media.

key.name: bluetooth-applet
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show a Bluetooth applet.

key.name: desktop-background
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to draw the desktop background.

key.name: end-session-dialog
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show the end session dialog.

key.name: idle-monitor
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used for user activity monitoring.

key.name: input-sources
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to manage keyboard layouts and input methods.

key.name: notifications
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to manage notifications.

key.name: polkit
key.description: This is the same authentication agent that was provided by PolicyKit-gnome.

key.name: power-applet
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show a power applet.

key.name: screencast
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to record the screen.

key.name: screensaver
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used as a screensaver.

key.name: screenshot
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to take screenshots.

key.name: shell
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used as a shell.

key.name: sound-applet
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show a sound applet. This is the same sound applet that used to be a part of GNOME Control Center.

key.name: status-notifier-watcher
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used as Status Notifier Watcher.

key.name: workarounds
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will use workarounds to fix bugs.
